meta.reasoning: Successfully created MonthlyPaymentDetailsViewV1 with all requested features: glassmorphism design, animated donut chart, summary cards, payment schedule table with status badges, search/filter controls. Integrated with PaymentTimelineViewV1 via sheet presentation. Build succeeded. Key learnings: existing SummaryCard struct has different interface (uses items array), needed to create private MonthlySummaryCard to avoid conflict. Design system provides GlassPanelStyle, SemanticColors, Spacing, CornerRadius for consistent styling.
